title: Echelon Calibration Certificate
description: Canonical schema for calibration certificates issued by Echelon's Theatre system. Consumed by Hounfour's router for tier-based model routing and by Loa's manifest reader for constraint yielding gate enforcement. v1.0.0.

execution_path.description: Whether this certificate was produced by a Product Theatre (replay) or Market Theatre (market).

criteria.description: Structured evaluation criteria from the Theatre template.

weights.description: Per-criterion weights. Keys subset of criteria_ids. Values sum to 1.0 (runtime-enforced).

scores.description: Per-criterion scores. Keys are criteria_ids. Values normalised 0.0â€“1.0.

precision.description: Classification precision. Primarily for Product Theatres.

recall.description: Classification recall. Primarily for Product Theatres.

reply_accuracy.description: Response accuracy. Primarily for Product Theatres.

brier_score.description: Probabilistic calibration. Primarily for Market Theatres. Lower is better.

replay_count.description: Number of episodes scored. Minimum 50 for BACKTESTED tier.

evidence_bundle_hash.description: SHA-256 of the evidence bundle. Raw hex, no 0x prefix.

ground_truth_hash.description: SHA-256 of the ground truth dataset. Raw hex, no 0x prefix.

construct_version.description: Exact commit hash of construct under test.

construct_chain_versions.description: For compositional chains: construct_id to commit hash.

dataset_hash.description: SHA-256 of replay dataset. Raw hex, no 0x prefix.

verification_tier.description: Trust tier per v0 rules. Gates Hounfour model routing and constraint yielding.

commitment_hash.description: Theatre's commitment hash for third-party verification. SHA-256 of canonical JSON composite.

expires_at.description: Expiry per tier rules. BACKTESTED: 90 days. PROVEN: 180 days.

theatre_committed_at.description: When the Theatre parameters were committed.
